Chakra Charging Technique
prerequisite: Must be able to produse and use Chakra.
description: Chakra is the essence of life and is essential to even the most basic technique. Through various methods, the most common of which is hand seals, chakra can be controlled and manipulated to create an effect that would not be possible otherwise, such as walking on water, exhaling fire, or creating illusions. Chakra is ordinarily not visible to the unaided eye unless it is highly concentrated or manifested in large amounts. This is rarely seen due to the restrictions of eight specific tenketsu known as the Eight Gates, which limit the amount of chakra an individual can release at a single given time. All of that said, when ones Chakra runs out, they lose all of that versatility when it may be needed most, and in some cases, if no one chakra to lose, they could very well lose their life instead. In such cases, one may burn their energy used for Evasion Points to forcibly produce the chakra they need in times of emergency. This restores an additional +3 Chakra Points per additional -2EP burnt.

name: Fire Style: Firestarter Technique
description: Possibly the most basic fire style ninjutsu, the user breathes out a small, dry flame. This technique is often used for anything from lighting a camp fire or a small act of arson, but otherwise, it has little use for combat dealing only 5 Damage, and not even severe enough to cause a full tier of Burn at it's base level. Every 2 points of chakra added to this technique will increase its effect by +3 damage, +1 OP, and +1% Burn, but is still so small and near user that it uses their OP, (not ROP), if wielded offensively.

name: Wind Style: Heavy Breeze Technique
description: Possibly the most basic wind style ninjutsu, the user forces the surrounding air to blow in a different direction. This technique is mosty used to keep yourself, and your scent, downwind, or on the contrary, blow something upwind, such as smells or powders or leaves, etc. For direct combat, this technique may not have much use other than blowing small nuisances away, having a pushing Str of 5, but possibly, if stronger than those in it's way, or if the targets are caught off guard, it will push those hit prone, but not hurt them. These winds also reduce the ROP of an incoming attack by -5. The effect of these winds reach are equal to the users ROP+5, aswell as add +5 ROP to any ranged attacks. For every +2 chakra point pushed into these winds, their Strength and distance increases by +3, and reduces incoming ROP by -3.

name: Lightning Style: Spark Technique
description: Possibly the most basic lightning style ninjutsu, the user emits an electric shock from their fingertips. This technique is mosty used to disable small electronic devices or even torture. For direct combat, this technique may not seem to have much use, dealing only 3 damage, but can temporarily disable limbs, or a strong enough shock to the chest or head may knock a target prone! For every + 2 chakra points pushed into these shocks, their damage increases by +3 and may disable limbs for an extra round.

name: Earth Style: Earth Encampment Technique
description: Possibly the most basic earth style ninjutsu, the user raises interlocking slabs of earth to form a tent like structure intended to shelter one from nature, needing to lay or crouch Prone to fit inside unless the size is increased enough to be taller than the one in it. It is not particularly helpful in a fight, having only 5DP of defense in it's base state, but good for camping overnight. If used offensively to pin or encase their target, one uses ROP to hit their mark. If pinned, the target will be grappled against a strength equal to it's DP, but not hurt, and need to struggle or break free. It's base dimensions are 6'L×3'W×3'H and about 3 inches thick. Adding incriments of +1ChP and 2ib of earth increases each dimension and ROP by +1 and the overal DP by +3.

name: Water Style: Water Purifying Technique
description: Possibly the most basic water style ninjutsu, the user filters water, using chakra to remove or destroy any impurities within the H²0. This was intended to be used to clean water from rivers while hunting or on missions, but medical nin are even known to later impliment this idea while healing those afflicted with sickness or poison, able to remove 1% of poison damage. In its base form, it can remove any impurities from up to one quart (32oz) of water, just leaving H²O. Every +1 chakra point and cup (8oz) of water added to this can purify an extra Pint (16oz) and remove 1% more of poison.

name: Clone Technique
cost: 3 Chakra Points per Clone Per Minute
description: This is a basic technique that every shinobi should be able to use. For this technique, users create one or more illusory clones of themselves to visably perform simple actions but have no substance and thus are incapable of physical contact or impact. For every clone conjured, the odds of hitting a clone instead of the castor by a threat unaware of the real shinobi's position is increased. For example, casting a single clone would create a 50% chance of attacking the clone or the real target, where as a maximum of 10 Clones would create a 9% chance of attacking the real being, and 91% chance of attacking a clone. *If more exact positions are specified, then the user of this technique must share their real position privately to a 3rd party moderator as proof. This is true for all sorts of clones. If a clone or the user attacks, and the target is not aware of their identity, the target must assume the stats for dodging are that of the real being and decide how to counter prior to the real damage calculation's or identitie's reveal. *Whether or not it is a clone or the player attacking must be revealed privately to a 3rd party moderator as proof. Dodging the clone, though typically costing less EP for mechanics, does not inherently give away their identity. This is true of all sorts of clones. The land speed of the clone is treated the same as the user's, but the clone must remain within R.O.P. distance to the user. A clone's EP and OP are equal to the castor's R.O.P., they do not have DP or HP. Their R.O.P., such as if throwing illusory shuriken, are equal to half of the user's ROP.

name: Transformation Technique
prerequisite: Be at least of Genin Rank
description: An academy graduate level Ninjutsu, the Transformation Technique allows the user to take the appearance of who or whatever they choose. Users will gain attributes and physical features similar to whatever they transform into, such as a weapon's sharpness or an animal's shape and size, though no smaller than half or larger than twice the user's size. A transformation increases your stealth score by 25%, allowing one to hide in plain sight as a random passersby in a crowded street or even a bush among trees. Although this disguises the castors appearance visually and physically, and may even alter their voice, it cannot hide their scent, or manurisms, so if a dusguised individual is conversing but does not know who they may be impersinating well, or if their illusion is mishapen such as a discolored leaf or missing scar, they may easily give away their facade prematurely. If the castor decides to transform into an inanimate object or even a wild animal, they may immitate some properties, but ultimately will not become what they appear to be. They may gain the sharp property of a swords blade, or a wolves claws, but will not obtain the swords damage or durability, nor the wolves hightened senses. They may obtain properties such as size, shape, weight, and texture, but will not be granted any stats such as damage nor natural abilities such as flight or poison. Complex item properties or abilities may not be replicated UNLESSS in the possessionof the castor when they use this techniqueto become said item. This illusory disguise is forcebly dispelled if user is struck directly, runs out of Chakra, or falls unconcious.

name: Rope Escape Technique
description: A basic, passive technique taught at the Academy. It allows a ninja to free themselves if they have been tied up, reducing time grappled or bound with rope/chain etc by 50%!
description_raw: A basic, passive technique taught at the Academy. It allows a ninja to free themselves if they have been tied up, reducing time grappled or bound with rope/chain etc by 50%!

name: One Thousand Years of Death
prerequisite: One must stealthfully get behind their target
description: The user tightly clasps their hands together and extends their middle and index fingers, resembling the Tiger hand seal. Using the full weight of their body, the user thrusts these four fingers, potentially holding a small item or weapon within them, between the target's buttocks. Despite the technique's dramatic name, it is not actually harmful. The pain is fairly extreme.... If one manages to pull this off, their target will be helplessly lauched up and foward by meters equal to half damage dealt and land prone!

name: Dynamic Entry
description: The technique requires the user to perform a jump kick into their opponent's face. User's are commonly known to throw a weapon, such as a kunai, at the enemy to distract them while he takes advantage of their blind spot in order to land the otherwise difficult blow, or otherwise save this move for when they find stealth to be on their side. The flair of this technique makes it a bit harder to land as they soar across the field, using their jumping distance, through the air to hit their mark, using ROP instead of EP, however, the impact is surprisingly potent, as the distance in feet jumped between the user and the target is added as damage and ROP to the attack. A direct hit will knock the target Prone.

name: Advanced TrajectoryTechnique
description: By accurately deflecting one projectile thrown with a half action off another one of the same kind thrown with a half action, you can redirect one or even both ,(but not at same target), projectiles' paths in mid-air! Doing so doubles the redirected weapon's natural ROP and can make it hit normaly unreachable targets, even in blind spots such as around corners, ignoring targets that "Take Cover"!

name: Crescent Moon Beheading
description: The user swings their sword, or similar weapon, in a single, large, crescent moon-shaped arc, which occurs with such ferocious velocity that the technique can be employed in situations where only a very limited time to react is available, adding +3OP per -3EP spent on the attack. The swing can also be used to counter attacks from multiple opponents or projectiles simultaneously by +3DP per -3EP.

name: Hidden Text Seal
cost: 1ChP to seal or unseal, 1oz of Ink
description: A basic seal taught to aspiring Genin, this allows the writer to hide text from any reader other than the intented. However, one better versed in Fuinjutsu may crack the message open if they happen upon this seal.

name: Painkiller Technique
description: This is the most basic medical jutsu, the user soothes pain of the target. This technique unfortunately does not affect injuries or status effects, but can lower swelling and bruising, relax and invigorate the musles, and reduce the feeling of pain. For every +2Chakra points poured from the user to the patient, an additional +3HP is regained. This simple jutsu is only as useful as it's castor, making it legendary in the right hands, able to heal additional HP equal to 1/10th the user's Iryojutsu Score.

name: Fusion Dance
description: Fyūjon is a technique said to beings from an extinct clan, of another world, or even from the pure land... It is a short series of poses that are performed by two Shinobi of roughly equal potential and roughly equal size. To correctly perform the Fusion, the fusees must strike the poses in a perfectly symmetrical image of one another. The result of a correctly performed Fusion Dance is a superior being whose power is the median of it's two parts, however, with full abilities of both! The two users of this technique must perform it simultaneously within 1 meter range of eachother, resulting in a new being whom's actions are shared between the two users. The fusese stats are both split in half as 50% of their individual chakra is spent, but as their bodies and souls merge into one, their stats are aswell, and this new body has full access to the inventories and abilities of both parties, and maybe more! The name of this union usually takes on the first half of the party with the more passive or submissive personality, and the second half of the party with the more dominant personality, (Domi"nant" + "Submi"ssive = Subminant), however, this new being is niether or, but a merged personality of both! This fusion lasts for 3 minutes (30 rounds), or until the new entity's HP or ChP reaches 0. After defusing, the damage taken to the union is split between the two partys as well as any remaining chakra.

name: Dead Bone Pulse: All-Killing Ash Bones
cost: 17 Health points and 13 Chakra Points per Shot
description: A certain-kill technique, the user hardens their own bones and protrudes them out of the skin, and then fires these weaponised structures from their back or from their palms at high speeds to the intended target. When these bones pierce a living organism, the bone and target starts to deteriorate at a molecular level, disintegrating the victim and reducing their bodies to nothing more than a pile of ash. Each bone rod, (All-Killing Ash Bone ), but rapidly disintegrate once they make any sort of impact, along with anything, or anyone, they peirce, (any object directly hit immediately loses an additional 9% of it's max DP). Every tier increases Damage and ROP by +5, and increases it's effect by +1 Sharp, Burn(Acid), and Poison, (objects lose an additional 3% max DP) by molding +6Chp and +9HP more into this chilling bone per tier.

name: Earth Resurrection Technique: Corpse Soil�
cost: 12 Chakra Points & 24Lbs of earth per Cadaver
description: This cursed jutsu was created by a iwagakure medical shinobi who wanted to bring back their dead comrades, orginally created in an effort of kindness the jutsu was stolen and used to commit atrocities. Since then this jutsu was forbidden in iwagakure and any records of it have been erased. It use chakra infused dirt that is stuffed inside a dead persons body to bring back their body however in a mindless, easy to control state by the re-animator, but can only bring them back at a fraction of their old selves. By using earth style to stuff dirt inside of a corpse the user can infuse 12 chakra points of their own to re-animate the dead, and restore their body with they chakra imbued earth. These newly undead pawns are completely under the users control and shall follow the castors will to the best of their ability, but unable to perform complex actions, restricted to 5 word instructions, and have only 20% of their former power restored. These empty shells are unable to speak, communicate, or perform any sort of jutsu, acting only on instinct and the will of their master, however, their lack of mind makes them immune to mental attacks, and their reliance on instinct grant them Hightened Senses, and use their full strength for their attacks. Ironically, the epitome of this uniquely powerful earth technique requires the assistance of lightning! A Cadaver resurected upon being struck by the full force of a lightning bolt will infuse with its energy and power. This new macabe golem of flesh and death will almost look truly alive again, and be restored to 40% of their power in life prior to death... These bodies do have their own minds however their Will and existence are still tethered to their master, bound to follow up to 10 word commands to the best of their ability. The "Hightened Senses" and use of full strength are lost to these cadavers, however, they have regained ths ability to use complex tools aswell, such as speaking and performing jutsu. The total amount of pawns under the caster is limited by their own Will. The sum of the Wills of those risen may not surpass that if the castor. If the castor wills it, or dies, all they have re-animated shall fall. Those risen may go no farther from the castor than miles equal to the castors Will. Bodies risen in the most basic way may only last for 24 hours, however, those restored more fully via lightning last for 168 hours. Any and all resurrected bodies gain a poison status to all their attacks and can cause bleed from their nails or teeth.

name: Reaper Death Seal
cost: Half of the castor's soul (Max HP&ChP), Half when finished.
description: After the hand seals are performed, the user's soul is partly separated from their body and suspended behind them. Behind their soul appears the Shinigami, which restrains their soul with its hair. Only the summoner is able to see the Shinigami at this point. After a few moments,�the Shinigami wraps its left arm with prayer beads and chants unintelligibly until a�cursed seal�appears on its arm, finishing the following round. It then drives it's arm into the summoner's soul, thus allowing the summoner to call upon the Shinigami to seal a target: the Shinigami's arm emerges from the summoner's body and grasps the target's soul. Targets are unableable to see the Shinigami until it's in contact with their soul unless they have special Doujutsu to see the silohuette of chakra. To make contact with the target, the user must grab them, or make a ranged attack, using their Will instead of ROP with a 50%chance to auto hit if the target is in range and unable to see the Shinigami, (25% f8r Byakugan/Sharingan, 0% auto hit for those with Rennigan), using their own body, or Shadow Clones, as an extension to the Shinigami's grasp. While the Shinigami grabs their soul, the target is immobilised, any�jutsu�they may be using are dispelled, and they are prevented from performing additional jutsu.�With targets unable to escape or fight back, the summoner can remove and seal their soul. The target's soul is sealed within the body of the summoner, represented by a swirl pattern on their stomach. With the sealing completed, the Shinigami gradually starts consuming the summoner's soul. The summoner for the next 2 minutesl/rounds can, with difficulty, continue moving and speaking, allowing them to finish any lingering business they may have, but they will die as soon as their soul has been fully consumed. The souls of the summoner and their victim do not pass on to the�Pure Land, instead being trapped within the Shinigami's stomach, destined to fight each other for all eternity... For every 1 point of your Max HP&ChP, you may seal 2 points of target max HP&CHP. You may seal 1 limb (causing them to lose feeling and slowly rot) for every 20% of their max HP taken, 1 Inner Gate for every 13% of max target ChPsealed, or or divide the spirit in equal parts, such as splitting the target's Yin and Yang halves of Chakra (50% ChP&HP) or percentile portions (may also effect stats). No matter what, the user's soul will be consumed by the Grim Reaper, aswell as any target the sealed within themself, but during this process, the user may split their target's soul(s) However they wish among other targets, willing or otherwise. The only way to free a soul from the Shinigami is known to By high ranking Uzumaki. Someone must done the sacred Shinigami mask to summon the god of death, then slit their own stomach open, freeing whatever souls they wish from the Shinigami's own stomach...

name: Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation
cost: 32oz of blood from deceased target, 1 living and immobile human sacrifice, Chakra difference between living sacrifice and summon, 1 Empty Scroll, 1 Kunai (Optional), 1 Blank Tag (Optional)
description: The�Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation�binds the soul of a deceased person to a living vessel, restoring them as they were when they were alive in order to do their summoner's bidding. It was originally created by�the second Hokage, some time after which he declared it a�kinjutsu. Before this technique can be performed, the user must first acquire some of the�DNA�of the person they intend to reincarnate. The soul of the intended reincarnated must also reside in the�Pure Land; souls trapped in the stomach of the�Shinigami, for example, cannot be reincarnated so long as they reside there. A living sacrifice is also required for the reincarnated soul to use as a vessel. To actually perform the Impure World Reincarnation, the DNA of the person to be reincarnated is smeared on a special scroll, each scroll size being able to hold an additional contract, the smallest scroll able to hold 1 contract. Once the scroll is activated, the remains spread out in the form of a special seal with the living sacrifice in the centre. Then dust and ash encase the sacrifice's body, giving them the same appearance that the reincarnated had at the time of their death. The Edo Shinobi has now been created. An Edo Tensei (ET) will never be as strong as it was in life, their Traits and Skills being 50% of what they were in life, but keep their Jutsu bank and can never run out of chakra or be killed, regenerating one of every applied status effect aswell as 10% EP, DP, HP and ChP per round. The only ways to defeat an ET are by killing the castor, if the ET are sealed, if the ET reach true closure, if the ET are deactivated by the castor, or if the ET themself know this jutsu and are given free will may release themself aswell. The ET are bound by the summoner's Will, and can break free of their masters control if their own Will is greater, or combined Will if Summoner has multiple ET. If the castor wishes for more control, they must write a "Mind Earasure Tag", tie or wrap it onto a kunai, and insert it into the back of the ET's head. The castor now has 3 options; ~~•Leave the ET with free will and 50% of their power.~~ ~~•Instruct the ET to commit to an objective, to which they will do to their best ability regardless of their mental willingness, but at 25% of their original power.~~ ~~•The castor may take full mental and control of the ET if they are able to sense them, but the castor is immobile while their conciousness pilots the Edo, which also limits the ET to 25% of it's original power.~~

name: Human Puppet Technique
prerequisite: Chikamatsu Clan, Puppetry Score: 100, Fuinjutsu Score: 50, Intelligence 100, a fresh human corpse
cost: An S-Rank crafting post. Any additional items or weapons added must be crafted with the human puppet separately
description: A�human puppet�(人傀儡,�Hitokugutsu) is a type of�puppet�created from human corpses, developed by�the old Puppet Brigade of�Sunagakure in the 2nd great shinobi war. By removing the internal organs of a foe and preserving the body to prevent decomposition, as well as adding weapons and defences, a practitioner of this technique can make powerful human puppets. Despite the name, though traditionally made to look just like themself in life, these puppets don't have to look human at all. These puppets are different from normal ones, as they retain their use of�chakra and any�kekkei genkai�that the human host once had. The stats of the human subject in life convert into stats of a puppet, a weapon, "losing" their Base Traits, but retaining 10% of the subjects DP, EP, OP, ROP, and even ChP, as the puppeteer took great care in meticulously recreating the subjects likeness, selecting between denser, thinner, heavier, and lighter materials and secret mechanisms to imitate what they were in life. Their "HP" is also converted into the puppets base damage, now taking away the life of others... For the puppet to use KKG, it must use the Puppet's own chakra source from their core. If the Puppets Core Chakra is 0, it cannot use it's KKG, until the user spends an action to refill it with their own chakra.

name: Puppet Heartstring
prerequisite: Chikamatsu Clan, Puppetry Score: 50, Fuinjutsu Score: 100, Intelligence 100, a Living Heart
cost: Max ChP equal to half of that transfered and 24 hours to recover
description: This forbidden technique was developed by a rogue shinobi of sunagakura, a puppeteer of the highest caliber who saught to be one with there art, immortality through their art... The heart of of a living subject is placed within a special, secure container that is is then sealed shut. The practitioner of this technique then seals the chakra, soul, and mind into this core. This core then, when placed within the core of a "Human Puppet", takes command as their new vessel. Where as creating a Human Puppet only translates about 10% of their stats in life, this core carries the subjects consciousness and soul along with 90% of their traits, merging with a Human Puppet to create a new 100% living weapon. I.e. the subjects Intelligence, Strength, Speed, Stamina, and Will are all reduced by -10%, this also effects the subjects other stats HP, DP, EP, OP, and ROP. The DP, EP, OP, and ROP of the human puppet is added to the subjects as they merge into one being. This would also allow the host of this core to use any KKG possesed by the Human Puppet it resides in. Alternatively, this "Puppet Heart | S+" could be crafted into a regular puppet aswell, however, these are lower in their potential power, restricted to regular Puppet limitations and without the benifits of carrying over special abilities from a prior vessel host. The subject of this technique will never again be human, though never truly a puppet either. The subject never again needs to breath, eat, drink, or sleep. The subjects new vessel cannot suffer from Bleeding or Poison except for direct hits to the core, which takes the effects if afflicted. That said, the body too is weak to fire, taking double damage from flame and burns. Only the core may be healed via medical ninjutsu, the bodie's DP must be repaired manually as one would with puppets. Only EP naturally recovers outside of encounters, not DP.

By sealing a portion of their own Sage embewed DNA and Chakra over the cararded artery of a willing, or imobile, individual. The trauma of this seal and this process of having these foreign elements merged into one's being removes 90% of their max HP and ChP, forcing them into an unconscious state if taken below 10% HP and below 10% ChP, or kill the target if it takes their HP and ChP to 0%... name: Fusion Dance
description: Fyūjon is a technique said to beings from an extinct clan, of another world, or even from the pure land... It is a short series of poses that are performed by two Shinobi of roughly equal potential and roughly equal size. To correctly perform the Fusion, the fusees must strike the poses in a perfectly symmetrical image of one another. The result of a correctly performed Fusion Dance is a superior being whose power is the median of it's two parts, however, with full abilities of both! The two users of this technique must perform it simultaneously within 1 meter range of eachother, resulting in a new being whom's actions are shared between the two users. The fusese stats are both split in half as 50% of their individual chakra is spent, but as their bodies and souls merge into one, their stats are aswell, and this new body has full access to the inventories and abilities of both parties, and maybe more! The name of this union usually takes on the first half of the party with the more passive or submissive personality, and the second half of the party with the more dominant personality, (Domi"nant" + "Submi"ssive = Subminant), however, this new being is niether or, but a merged personality of both! This fusion lasts for 3 minutes (30 rounds), or until the new entity's HP or ChP reaches 0. After defusing, the damage taken to the union is split between the two partys as well as any remaining chakra.

name: Dead Bone Pulse: All-Killing Ash Bones
cost: 17 Health points and 13 Chakra Points per Shot
description: A certain-kill technique, the user hardens their own bones and protrudes them out of the skin, and then fires these weaponised structures from their back or from their palms at high speeds to the intended target. When these bones pierce a living organism, the bone and target starts to deteriorate at a molecular level, disintegrating the victim and reducing their bodies to nothing more than a pile of ash. Each bone rod, (All-Killing Ash Bone ), but rapidly disintegrate once they make any sort of impact, along with anything, or anyone, they peirce, (any object directly hit immediately loses an additional 9% of it's max DP). Every tier increases Damage and ROP by +5, and increases it's effect by +1 Sharp, Burn(Acid), and Poison, (objects lose an additional 3% max DP) by molding +6Chp and +9HP more into this chilling bone per tier.

name: Earth Resurrection Technique: Corpse Soil�
cost: 12 Chakra Points & 24Lbs of earth per Cadaver
description: This cursed jutsu was created by a iwagakure medical shinobi who wanted to bring back their dead comrades, orginally created in an effort of kindness the jutsu was stolen and used to commit atrocities. Since then this jutsu was forbidden in iwagakure and any records of it have been erased. It use chakra infused dirt that is stuffed inside a dead persons body to bring back their body however in a mindless, easy to control state by the re-animator, but can only bring them back at a fraction of their old selves. By using earth style to stuff dirt inside of a corpse the user can infuse 12 chakra points of their own to re-animate the dead, and restore their body with they chakra imbued earth. These newly undead pawns are completely under the users control and shall follow the castors will to the best of their ability, but unable to perform complex actions, restricted to 5 word instructions, and have only 20% of their former power restored. These empty shells are unable to speak, communicate, or perform any sort of jutsu, acting only on instinct and the will of their master, however, their lack of mind makes them immune to mental attacks, and their reliance on instinct grant them Hightened Senses, and use their full strength for their attacks. Ironically, the epitome of this uniquely powerful earth technique requires the assistance of lightning! A Cadaver resurected upon being struck by the full force of a lightning bolt will infuse with its energy and power. This new macabe golem of flesh and death will almost look truly alive again, and be restored to 40% of their power in life prior to death... These bodies do have their own minds however their Will and existence are still tethered to their master, bound to follow up to 10 word commands to the best of their ability. The "Hightened Senses" and use of full strength are lost to these cadavers, however, they have regained ths ability to use complex tools aswell, such as speaking and performing jutsu. The total amount of pawns under the caster is limited by their own Will. The sum of the Wills of those risen may not surpass that if the castor. If the castor wills it, or dies, all they have re-animated shall fall. Those risen may go no farther from the castor than miles equal to the castors Will. Bodies risen in the most basic way may only last for 24 hours, however, those restored more fully via lightning last for 168 hours. Any and all resurrected bodies gain a poison status to all their attacks and can cause bleed from their nails or teeth.

The only way to free a soul from the Shinigami is known to By high ranking Uzumaki. Someone must done the sacred Shinigami mask to summon the god of death, then slit their own stomach open, freeing whatever souls they wish from the Shinigami's own stomach...
cost_raw: Half of the castor's soul (Max HP&ChP), Half when finished.
description_raw: After the hand seals are performed, the user's soul is partly separated from their body and suspended behind them. Behind their soul appears the Shinigami, which restrains their soul with its hair. Only the summoner is able to see the Shinigami at this point. After a few moments,�the Shinigami wraps its left arm with prayer beads and chants unintelligibly until a�cursed seal�appears on its arm, finishing the following round. It then drives it's arm into the summoner's soul, thus allowing the summoner to call upon the Shinigami to seal a target: the Shinigami's arm emerges from the summoner's body and grasps the target's soul. Targets are unableable to see the Shinigami until it's in contact with their soul unless they have special Doujutsu to see the silohuette of chakra. To make contact with the target, the user must grab them, or make a ranged attack, using their Will instead of ROP with a 50%chance to auto hit if the target is in range and unable to see the Shinigami, (25% f8r Byakugan/Sharingan, 0% auto hit for those with Rennigan), using their own body, or Shadow Clones, as an extension to the Shinigami's grasp. While the Shinigami grabs their soul, the target is immobilised, any�jutsu�they may be using are dispelled, and they are prevented from performing additional jutsu.�With targets unable to escape or fight back, the summoner can remove and seal their soul. The target's soul is sealed within the body of the summoner, represented by a swirl pattern on their stomach. With the sealing completed, the Shinigami gradually starts consuming the summoner's soul. The summoner for the next 2 minutesl/rounds can, with difficulty, continue moving and speaking, allowing them to finish any lingering business they may have, but they will die as soon as their soul has been fully consumed. The souls of the summoner and their victim do not pass on to the�Pure Land, instead being trapped within the Shinigami's stomach, destined to fight each other for all eternity... For every 1 point of your Max HP&ChP, you may seal 2 points of target max HP&CHP. You may seal 1 limb (causing them to lose feeling and slowly rot) for every 20% of their max HP taken, 1 Inner Gate for every 13% of max target ChPsealed, or or divide the spirit in equal parts, such as splitting the target's Yin and Yang halves of Chakra (50% ChP&HP) or percentile portions (may also effect stats). No matter what, the user's soul will be consumed by the Grim Reaper, aswell as any target the sealed within themself, but during this process, the user may split their target's soul(s) However they wish among other targets, willing or otherwise. Someone must done the sacred Shinigami mask to summon the god of death, then slit their own stomach open, freeing whatever souls they wish from the Shinigami's own stomach...

name: Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation
cost: 32oz of blood from deceased target, 1 living and immobile human sacrifice, Chakra difference between living sacrifice and summon, 1 Empty Scroll, 1 Kunai (Optional), 1 Blank Tag (Optional)
description: The�Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation�binds the soul of a deceased person to a living vessel, restoring them as they were when they were alive in order to do their summoner's bidding. It was originally created by�the second Hokage, some time after which he declared it a�kinjutsu. Before this technique can be performed, the user must first acquire some of the�DNA�of the person they intend to reincarnate. The soul of the intended reincarnated must also reside in the�Pure Land; souls trapped in the stomach of the�Shinigami, for example, cannot be reincarnated so long as they reside there. A living sacrifice is also required for the reincarnated soul to use as a vessel. To actually perform the Impure World Reincarnation, the DNA of the person to be reincarnated is smeared on a special scroll, each scroll size being able to hold an additional contract, the smallest scroll able to hold 1 contract. Once the scroll is activated, the remains spread out in the form of a special seal with the living sacrifice in the centre. Then dust and ash encase the sacrifice's body, giving them the same appearance that the reincarnated had at the time of their death. The Edo Shinobi has now been created. An Edo Tensei (ET) will never be as strong as it was in life, their Traits and Skills being 50% of what they were in life, but keep their Jutsu bank and can never run out of chakra or be killed, regenerating one of every applied status effect aswell as 10% EP, DP, HP and ChP per round. The only ways to defeat an ET are by killing the castor, if the ET are sealed, if the ET reach true closure, if the ET are deactivated by the castor, or if the ET themself know this jutsu and are given free will may release themself aswell. The ET are bound by the summoner's Will, and can break free of their masters control if their own Will is greater, or combined Will if Summoner has multiple ET. If the castor wishes for more control, they must write a "Mind Earasure Tag", tie or wrap it onto a kunai, and insert it into the back of the ET's head. The castor now has 3 options; •Leave the ET with free will and 50% of their power. •Instruct the ET to commit to an objective, to which they will do to their best ability regardless of their mental willingness, but at 25% of their original power. •The castor may take full mental and control of the ET if they are able to sense them, but the castor is immobile while their conciousness pilots the Edo, which also limits the ET to 25% of it's original power.

name: Human Puppet Technique
prerequisite: Chikamatsu Clan, Puppetry Score: 100, Fuinjutsu Score: 50, Intelligence 100, a fresh human corpse
cost: An S-Rank crafting post. Any additional items or weapons added must be crafted with the human puppet separately
description: A�human puppet�(人傀儡,�Hitokugutsu) is a type of�puppet�created from human corpses, developed by�the old Puppet Brigade of�Sunagakure in the 2nd great shinobi war. By removing the internal organs of a foe and preserving the body to prevent decomposition, as well as adding weapons and defences, a practitioner of this technique can make powerful human puppets. Despite the name, though traditionally made to look just like themself in life, these puppets don't have to look human at all. These puppets are different from normal ones, as they retain their use of�chakra and any�kekkei genkai�that the human host once had. The stats of the human subject in life convert into stats of a puppet, a weapon, "losing" their Base Traits, but retaining 10% of the subjects DP, EP, OP, ROP, and even ChP, as the puppeteer took great care in meticulously recreating the subjects likeness, selecting between denser, thinner, heavier, and lighter materials and secret mechanisms to imitate what they were in life. Their "HP" is also converted into the puppets base damage, now taking away the life of others... For the puppet to use KKG, it must use the Puppet's own chakra source from their core. If the Puppets Core Chakra is 0, it cannot use it's KKG, until the user spends an action to refill it with their own chakra.

name: Puppet Heartstring
prerequisite: Chikamatsu Clan, Puppetry Score: 50, Fuinjutsu Score: 100, Intelligence 100, a Living Heart
cost: Max ChP equal to half of that transfered and 24 hours to recover
description: This forbidden technique was developed by a rogue shinobi of sunagakura, a puppeteer of the highest caliber who saught to be one with there art, immortality through their art... The heart of of a living subject is placed within a special, secure container that is is then sealed shut. The practitioner of this technique then seals the chakra, soul, and mind into this core. This core then, when placed within the core of a "Human Puppet", takes command as their new vessel. Where as creating a Human Puppet only translates about 10% of their stats in life, this core carries the subjects consciousness and soul along with 90% of their traits, merging with a Human Puppet to create a new 100% living weapon. I.e. the subjects Intelligence, Strength, Speed, Stamina, and Will are all reduced by -10%, this also effects the subjects other stats HP, DP, EP, OP, and ROP. The DP, EP, OP, and ROP of the human puppet is added to the subjects as they merge into one being. This would also allow the host of this core to use any KKG possesed by the Human Puppet it resides in. Alternatively, this "Puppet Heart | S+" could be crafted into a regular puppet aswell, however, these are lower in their potential power, restricted to regular Puppet limitations and without the benifits of carrying over special abilities from a prior vessel host. The subject of this technique will never again be human, though never truly a puppet either. The subject never again needs to breath, eat, drink, or sleep. The subjects new vessel cannot suffer from Bleeding or Poison except for direct hits to the core, which takes the effects if afflicted. That said, the body too is weak to fire, taking double damage from flame and burns. Only the core may be healed via medical ninjutsu, the bodie's DP must be repaired manually as one would with puppets. Only EP naturally recovers outside of encounters, not DP.

name: Eight Gates
rank: Prereq: Taijutsu Score of 80, 6th Gate Open
cost: Desc: The 7th gate, located below the stomach, causes the user's body to secrete a blueish, water heavy sweat. The sweat immediately evaporates, creating an aura around the user that can be mistaken for chakra increasing the the tier of burning and bleeding by +1°. Opening this gate allows the user to perform the "Daytime Tiger", a single punch that creates a pocket of compressed air. After opening this gate, the user's muscle fibers rupture, causing them intense pain if anyone touch him as all of their limbs become disabled.
description: The Eight Gates exist in order to limit the flow of chakra within an individual's body. Ordinarily, individuals can use no more than 20% of their body's full potential, the brain's way of protecting the individual from harming their body through overexertion. With training, individuals can learn to remove these limiters, referred to as "opening" the gates. For any gate to open, the one before it must be opened. With each opened gate, individuals are given access to more and more of their body's chakra, thus increasing their physical strength and speed each stage incrimently by +16% of the stage prior, but at the cost of their own health, or even life, for once you close the gates, your Strength, Speed, and Taijutsu will reduce by an amount equal to the boost aquired from the highest gate opened that day for 26 hours, reducing Your current HP, EP, and DP by the same amount this reduces your max HP, EP, and DP by... The Eight Gates **The Gate of Opening (開門, Kaimon)**

name: Seven Heavenly Breaths
rank: Prereq: Taijutsu Score of 70, 6th Stage Active
cost: Desc: This stage causes the user's body to secrete a blueish, water heavy sweat. The sweat immediately evaporates, creating an aura around the user that can be mistaken for blue chakra increasing the the tier of burning and bleeding by +1°. The twisting winds around you now has grown to officially be recognized as a dust devil, or twister at 23 meters, (70'), high and 5 meters wide, reducing the OP and ROP of any enemy attack by -28. This vortex is now string and thick enough to obscure the view of any looking into or out of it, treating their view as blind. Activating this Srage allows the user to perform the "Seven Heavenly Dragon's Breath", causing the top of their tornado to split into seven dragon heads that the user may pull down to strike and carry their foes...
description: A taijutsu breathing method developed by gathering up large amounts of oxygen to increase ones lung capacity many fold, the user is granted strength similar to the Eight Gates, even including similar physical changes to the user, but fewer drawbacks. Much like the Eight Gates, this technique has several stages or "activations" (活性, kassei). Opening a "Gate" removes a natural limiter, which as a consequence, results in significant changes to your bodily functions that improve ones physical capabilities to dangerous degrees the body may not be able to maintain unharmed, however, instead of releasing these limiters, these "Stages" manually replicate these bodily changes directly.With each "Activation", individuals increase their physical strength and speed each stage incrimently by +14% of the prior, but at the risk of over exhaustion, for once you revert the "Stages", your Strength, Speed, and Taijutsu will reduce by an amount equal to the boost aquired from the highest "Activation" that day for 26 hours, reducing Your current HP, EP, and DP by the same amount this reduces your max HP, EP, and DP by, though not deadly, can cause the user to knock out... The Seven Breaths **The First Activation (第一活性, Daiichi Kassei)**

name: Poison Creation
prerequisite: Dependant on the type of poison
description: Through the practice of iryojutsu a user of this technique can learn to create varying levels of poison, each rather deadly with unique traits that can cause devastating effects on the battlefield, turning the tides of combat in the castor's favor. To create these poisons one must do so in a crafting post with the ranks of the different poisons being equivalent to the lines required with item crafting of the same rank. D-Rank Prerequisite: 20 Iryojutsu, 10 Intelligence The basic poison commonly sold in most shops that are exclusive to Shinobi is the first type of poison medical Shinobi learn. When Crafted the castor will produce three vials of poison per 6 lines. This poison when introduced to the inside of a target's body will cause a tier of poison which can either be healed with certain medicine or with the proper iryojutsu technique. C-Rank Prerequisite: 60 Iryojutsu, 60 Intelligence After properly learning how to make a basic poison in liquid form, Shinobi can then learn how to create such a thing in gas form, allowing for an easier time poisoning targets. Alongside that this poison will cause two tiers of poison and cause a sense of dizziness in a target, reducing their EP, OP, ROP, and movement speed by 20% for as long as they are affected. This poison can also be made in a liquid state as well. If one wishes to be healed by this they must be healed by poison extraction but will take 50% longer if the person healing it has a lower Iryojutsu score than the creator of the poison. It will go faster if the healer instead has double the score. If medical supplies are used it will only be able to heal the tiers of poison, the stat reduction will continue on for a minute after. This poison takes 15 lines to craft B-Rank Prerequisite: 100 Iryojutsu, 100 Intelligence From here the skill required to create poisons increases rather exponentially. With this level of poison when administered to a target they will gain t3 poison, and have a 30% reduction to their movement speed, OP, EP, and ROP. On top of that however they will also become half deaf as their hearing slowly starts to fade. Similarly to the rank before if medical supplies are used it will only heal the poison with the effects lasting afterwards for one minute. The same effects follow for using poison extraction. This poison takes 24 lines to craft A-Rank Prerequisite: 150 Iryojutsu, 150 Intelligence The next rank of poison allows for medical Shinobi to provide a deadly touch to the battlefield. Far deadlier than the previous ranks. When applied to a target it causes t4 poison and reduces the target's Movement speed, OP, EP, and ROP by 40%, robbing the target of their hearing completely as well as their sight partially! For this to be healed one must use either poison extraction or medical supplies, however the medical supplies will not remove the status effects as those fade within a minute after usage. Requires 33 lines to craft. S-Rank Prerequisite: 200 Iryojutsu, 500cc The final and most deadly type of poison most medical Shinobi know, with it those affected are robbed of their senses. Gaining 5 tiers of poison, their movement speed, OP, ROP, and EP are all reduced by 50% and lose their sight and hearing as well. Medical supplies cannot fully heal this type of poison regardless of how many times used, only reducing the tier of the poison to 1. While poison extraction can work here the person using it has to have an equal or greater Iryojutsu score in comparison to the person who created the poison. Otherwise they too can only heal up to 4 tiers. This poison takes 42 lines to craft

name: The Four Stances
description: Devopled by the samurai clans of the iron summit this kenjutsu has been passed down for generations, finding great use in battle. The user takes a specific stance to temporarily enhance their self through skill and technique alone. However these stances take an immense amount of training in the art of kenjutsu. When someone takes these stances they must pay chakra as they strengthen their inner and outer self however once paid they do not have to pay again unless they deactivate the stance, ontop of not being able to use any other type of Jutsu while in this state besides other kenjutsu.

name: Ghost Stance

name: Shadow Clone Technique
prerequisite: Must know Clone Jutsu, 100 Chakra Control
description: This jutsu allows the user to create one or more copies of themselves from their very on shadow. The user's�chakra�is evenly divided between themselves and their clones: creating one clone will give it half the user's chakra, creating two clones will give each a third of the user's chakra, and so on. The clones stats directly corellate, being the same % of the originals stats as the portion of split Chakra. For example, if 1 shadow clone is created, it will possess 50% of the users current chakra and stats. Depending on how much chakra the user has and how many clones they make, this rapid depletion of their reserves can be dangerous, limiting the castor to no more than 10 clones at any time. Unlike the basic�Clone Technique, shadow clones are physically real. They possess the same clothing, damage, and transformations as the user at the time of their creation. Most tools and weaponry are copied when the shadow clones are created,�but�complicated technology�won't be duplicated. Because they are visually identical and possess the same chakra as the user, shadow clones are indistinguishable from their original, not even by�djutsu, presumably, other than the Rinnegan or the Tenseigan. Because they have their own chakra, shadow clones can perform other�jutsu, including making more shadow clones. Shadow clones usually disperse once they or their castor runs out of their ChP or HP. When a clone's task is completed, it can disperse itself or be dispersed by its user. Once dispersed, the clone's intel, experiences, and 50% of their remaining chakra points are transferred back to the user. This also means any Jutsu Scores they increase directly adds to the user's once dispersed!

name: Fire Style: Fire Dragon Bullet Technique
description: The user moulds�the fire�into the shape of a dragon, which they then direct at a target. The inferno crashes through the target, dealing significant physical damage, and burns. The more talented the user, the greater the amount of fire that the dragon can be made from and heat produced. This fierce pyre has a diameter of 2 meters, and can stretch out up to 16 meters in length! The sheer force of impact from this beast deals 25 damage, +1 Burn(Lit), and easily knock prone any unable to evade the user's ROP +10. For each additional 10ChP, a skilled castor may increase the size by 1 meter in width and 4 meters in length, increasing the Damage by +10, +1 Burn(Lit), and ROP by +5.

name: Shadow Imitation Technique
prerequisite: Must be of the Nara Clan.
cost: 15 Chakra Points per minute/round. Cost is halved when used on willing targets.
description: The Shadow Imitation Technique, sometimes called the shadow possession technique, is the signature technique of the Nara clan. The user manipulates their shadow across a surface to merge it with a target or targets' shadow. The user can stretch their shadow however they wish, up to a distance of meters equal to their ROP+"Deer Shadow", in order to accomplish this goal, but they are limited by their shadow's surface area, meaning that if a target can move far enough away from the Shadow Imitation's user, they are theoretically safe from it. But there are ways around this: the user's shadow can freely move within other shadows, extending its range, such as creating a flash of light to briefly extend their own shadow or to extend his targets', doubling the effective range. The user may also connect their shadow to another shadow, allowing them to extend the range by +50%, but reducing this extention by 10% per connected shadow. The user must have a shadow to manipulate, and so the Shadow Imitation cannot be used in complete darkness. Once a user merges their shadow with a target's, the castor may restrain the target, rendering them unable to move on their own other than to talk. The only movements they are able to make are those that the user makes: if the user walks forward, the target walks forward; if the user raises their right hand, the target raises their right hand, etc. The user may also connect their shados to a target, either willingly or without their knowledge, waiting for them to move closer to another target before restricting connected parties. Doing so may double the shadows base reach. Controlling the targets body is treated as a grapple of the target's Str vs the castor's Sta+"Deer Shadow". The user may take hold of multiple targets at once if they are in range to be connected by the shadows, but the user mist grapple with the strength of all trapped parties. If the target or user are forcibly moved while connected, this will still refect onto both parties.

name: Partial Expansion Technique
prerequisite: Must be of the Akimichi Clan.
cost: 5 Chakra Points & 50 Calories per 100% increase per minute/round. Cost is doubled if expanding two limbs.
description: Partial Expansion is one of the unique hijutsu techniques of the Akimichi clan where the user increases the size of only specific body parts, typically the arms and legs. Because of the larger size, physical attacks made with the expanded limbs do greater damage than normal aswell as show to be more durable. If you use this ability on a limb, it will double it's size! Increasing it's size by 100% will increase your strength with that arm by 50% and give you +25% temp DP when using the limb to block attacks! You may also use this ability on your torso aswell, but it will make your torso round like a ball, which makes movement difficult, halving your land speed, OP, and ROP unless using the "Human Boulder Technique".

name: Ventriloquism
prerequisite: Must be a member of the Chikimatsu Clan
cost: 1 Chakra Points per 1 Meter Voice Thrown
description: Ventriloquism is an act of stagecraft in which a person (a ventriloquist) speaks in such a way that it looks like their voice is coming from a different location, usually through a puppet known as a "dummy". The act of ventriloquism is ventriloquizing, and the ability to do so is commonly called in E the ability to "throw" one's voice. The term "throwing your voice" is a misconception about traditional ventriloquism however, as the voice always comes from the ventriloquist. However, a skilled ventriloquist can make it sound like their voice is coming from far away by varying its modulation and level in volume and pitch. Members of the Chikimatsu clan take this one step further however by incorporating their shinobi techniques, capable of literally carrying their voice from one point to release in another by simply molding the chakra through their mouth as they form their words! Of course, they pick up the traditional practice aswell when learning this technique, able to "throw" their voice 1 foot away for every 10 points in their Kugujutsu score without using any chakra at all, adding this traditional form's distance aswell to the total distance of this technique! Typically, this may used in conjunction with their "Puppet Technique" to give the illusion that the puppet itself is the one speaking, while keeping their true position hidden from view, however this may also be cleverly employed as misdirection to trick one into looking the otherway to the sound of your voice as you make a clean getaway, or use this moment of distraction to make a half stealth attack, assuming the target is not smart enough to catch wise... Other potential uses may vary far or few, limited inly by the performer's own creativity!

name: Puppet Technique
prerequisite: Must be of the Chikamatsu Clan
cost: 2 Chakra Points per thread per minute
description: The Puppet Technique is the core skill of a puppeteer's fighting style, whereby they control a weaponized puppet. Performing the Puppet Technique involves emitting chakra threads from a user's fingers to connect to a puppet, with the fingers' movements controlling the puppet's actions. Less experienced users will connect all ten of their fingers to a single puppet, with each finger controlling a specific joint or mechanism. As a user becomes more experienced they require fewer threads to control a single puppet, until finally they can control a puppet using only one thread. With this growing mastery, users also become able to control multiple puppets at a time. A puppet made out of anything other than wood costs twice as much to wield, and if these threads are used on unwilling people, treat them as a "Stunned", (able to be forcebly moved at half speed), using 10% of Puppeteer's ROP per thread vs their target's Strength to break free, as if they were grappled. The furthest a puppet may be from its wielder is equal to the wielders own ROP. A puppets total OP is equal to it's own OP, (if any), plus the user's ROP. The total melee attack of a puppet would deal damage equal to half of the user's ROP, plus any additional damage the puppet may have. Newer puppeteers may control one XL Sized Puppet, or XL Puppet Part, about 2 meters in size, at a time, requiring 10 threads to maneuver. For reference, an XXL sized puppet is about 4 meters in size; XL=2m, 10 threads; L= 1m, 8 Threads; Sm= 1'6", 6 Threads; T= 9", 4 Threads.

name: Blinding Ash Technique
description: Ironically, the Sarutobi developed this technique in order to snuff out or contain controled fires, however, it can be a very damaging substance, so saftey is advised when breathing out this stream of literal ash, that also obscures extra sensory abilities from the chakra infused ash, and to keep away from one's face and eyes... If a living being is unfortunate enough to be at the other end of these cinders, they will recieve +1 Burn(Acid), and +1 Temp half blindess as the ash spreads into thecair and floats into their eyes, or +1 Temp Blindness if directly striking the target's face which would also cause choking damage. This pew of ash is spat using the castors ROP+4. Each additional +2ChP poured into this increases all effects by+1, and ROP+2.

name: Hiding in Ash Technique
description: The user expels chakra-infused ash that blanket a wide area, burning anyone who comes in contact with it. The technique can also be used as a powerful deterrent from attacks as well as a highly effective smokescreen. This technique is a far more effective substitute for smoke bombs as it can even obscure extra sensory abilities from the chakra infused ash. At it's lowest level, this covers a 2m×2m×2m area, needing +8ROP if in range to attempt evading. This treats anyone inside as hidden and blinded, and causing +1 Burn(Acid) per round inside this cloud, which lasts 3 rounds, and also causes Suffication unless those inside can hold theor breath long enough... Every additional 4 Chakra points added increases Burn(Acid), rounds, and all dimensions by +1, which increases ROP by +4.

name: Ash Clone Technique
prerequisite: Must know Clone Jutsu, 50 Chakra, Must be of Sarutobi Lineage Control
description: The user molds their fire chakra, together with the ash within their own lungs, to form into one or several identical clones. Unlike regular clones, ones generated by this method do not just disappear when struck with sufficient force, but rather burn the surounding area and leave a fog of blinding ash. Ash Clones stats are 10% that of the origional castors stats and are able to cast any jutsu of the summoner. Unlike the basic Clone Technique, ash clones are physically real. They possess the same clothing, damage, and transformations as the user at the time of their creation. Most tools and weaponry are copied when the shadow clones are created, but complicated technology or effects won't be duplicated. Because they are visually identical and possess the same chakra as the user, fire clones are indistinguishable from their original, not even by dōjutsu other than the Byakugan, Mangekyo Sharingan, or presumably, the Rinnegan or Tenseigan. Because they have their own chakra, ash clones can perform other jutsu, including making more ash clones. Unlike other clones, these don't just disperse, but rather discharge hot ash, burning anyone and anything within ROP range when "dispersed", causing the "Burn" status. This cloud deals damage equal to half the ChP of the clone before being dispersed, dealing +1 Burn and +10ROP +1 Round per 10 ChP, it's ROP determines how much EP is needed to dodge aswell as the diameter of it's blackened fog, which remains for one round, temporarily blinding any within it's area of effect while also granting those within stealth coverage. Ash clones will also disperse once they or their castor runs out of their ChP or HP. When a clone's task is completed, it can disperse itself or be dispersed by its user.

name: Ash Dragon Bullet Technique
description: The user moulds the ash from their lungs into the shape of a dragon, which they then direct at a target. The burning ashes crash through the target, dealing significant physical damage, and burns, as well as a blinding shroud of ashen debris. The more talented the user, the greater the amount of ash that the dragon can be made from ash produced. This fierce pyre has a diameter of 3 meters, and can stretch out up to 15 meters in length! The sheer force of impact from this beast deals 20 damage, +1 Burn(Acid), and easily knock prone any unable to evade the user's ROP +15, as well as leaving a similarly sized trail of ashen cloud in place of its body upon being dispelled, or a 20m Diameter cloud of burning ash upon crashing into a solid area instead, that also obscures extra sensory abilities from the chakra infused ash and takes 6 seconds to settle, causing +1°Burn(Acid) per round and Temporary Blindness, as well as offering Half Stealth, to those inside. For each additional 15ChP, a skilled castor may increase the size by 2 meter in width and 3 meters in length, increasing the Damage by +10, +1 Burn(Acid), ROP by +5, and increasing the Diameter of the ashen cover by +6m, lasting an additional 6 seconds.

name: Mind Transfer Technique
prerequisite: Must be of the Yamanaka Clan.
cost: 15 Chakra Points per minute/round. Cost is halved when used on willing targets.
description: The Mind Body Switch Technique is the signature technique of the Yamanaka clan. The user converts their consciousness to spiritual energy, which they send at a target. Their consciousness moves slowly towards the target and travels in a straight line reaching meters equal to the castor's ROP+"Boar Mind". If the user misses their target, it will take several minutes for their consciousness to find its way back to their own body. The user converts their consciousness to spiritual energy with their chakra, which they may then project into a living targets mind. If the user misses their target, it will take 1 minute per meter away for their consciousness to find its way back to their own body. When their consciousness does successfully make it to the target, the user supplants the target's mind and takes total control of their body. When hijacking anothers body, the user's collapses. Controlling the body is treated as a grapple of the target's Will vs the castor's Will+"Boar Mind". Any damage sustained to the posessed body will reflect on the user's own origional body. If the user willingly releases this ability, they will instantly return to their own. If the user is forced out, it will rake rounds equal to meters away from their body to return to it.

name: Human BoulderTechnique
prerequisite: Be a member of the Akimichi clan.
description: This is a "showy" taijutsu unique to members of the Akimichi clan. This is most often used after growing in size with the Multi-Size/Expansion Technique, or even the " Partial Expansion" jutsu when expqnding their torso, the Akimichi tucks themselves into a ball and rolls towards a target. Due to their increased weight and the force of their rotation, most obstacles are pulverised upon contact. However, the ball's speed also makes it difficult to turn, forcing users to stop spinning entirely if they want to make significant changes in direction. When using this ability, the user's full strength score deals damage instead of half since they are using the propelled force of their entire body! Given some mobile limitations, and the use of the body as a charging weapon, the user uses ROP instead of OP when atraching with this technique.

name: Blood Dragon Eye
prerequisite: Must be an Chinoike , or transplant a Ketsuryūgan.
cost: -3ChP per Minute activated per eye activated, Doubled for non-Chinoike
description: The Ketsuryūgan is recognised by its reddish colour, giving a special appearance for the users of this dōjutsu, characterised as holders of "eyes as red as blood". Its power earned it comparison to the Three Great Dōjutsu, increasing the users "Genjutsu Score" by an amount equal to 50% of their "Ketsuryūgan score". The Ketsuryūgan confers genjutsu casting abilities either by making physical skin contact with the target or meeting each other's gaze. Upon which, they can hypnotise the victim in a variety of ways with their "Genjutsu: Ketsuryūgan", or even delve deep into their minds to extract information. The Ketsuryūgan also gave the users the ability to manipulate iron, or more accurately, any liquid with a high iron concentration. As such, fitting with its moniker, the Ketsuryūgan can manipulate the blood within a living target, whether if be themselves or another being.

name: Illusion Technique: Blood Dragon Eye
description: By establishing direct skin or eye contact, (use ROP to make eye contact), with a target, the user can lock them within a genjutsu for one of various purposes. They can brainwash them into mindless drones with a set order to follow, or trap them into a dream-like state. For more defensive means, this technique can create a powerful barrier against mind reading, protecting information from being acquired. This also allows the user to place genjutsu guards upon their own mind and see through the target's memories. Upon being placed under this genjutsu, the targets body will be "Unconcious", and they will start "Suffocating", however, this suffocation effects the targets DP, only effecting HP if one has no DP to lose. One may also plant this genjutsu in their minds or the minds of others to trigger upon having their minds being looked into, and cast upon the one trying to get into their mind. Once a target is in this state, the castor may use this genjutsu again to look into the vague memories of the target, but only see these flashes of memories, not here them. These memories can go as far back as one week per teir, needing an additional 10 ChP per week older, for as far as 10 weeks. Alternatively, if the target has been injected/ingested with 5% of the castor's blood (HP) or 1 pint of Iron heavy water, and 5% of the castors Chakra, the user may cast this genjutsu upon the target again while in their unconcious state to direct their body, giving it an order it will do its best to carry out as long as it isn't directly detrimental to it's own life. This also doubles the strength of the genjutsu over the target.

name: Great Wolf Eyes
prerequisite: Must be an Ōkami , or Transplant an Ōkamiogan.
cost: Dependent on Stage, Doubled for non-Ōkami
description: The Ōkamiogan's origins are are debated, as some say they are gifts from daiyōkai ancestors, while others claim they are descendants of a god, however, what is agreed is far more important, which is that only those worthy of ruling over others are worthy enough to posesses these eyes, and all others are to be ruled over. Lastly, their is a higher stage of this dōjutsu, a awakened state that is forbidden to all but one, they who have been chosen to command the rest. The law of the Ōkami clan that posesses these eyes dictate only one pair may exist. If two were to posesses these at the same time, they would have to dual, they are almost compelled too... Ōkamiogan: Unlike many other Dojutsu, the effects of these eyes activation course through out the users body, not so much increasing their vision, but seeing things differently and attuning them to their other heightening senses, gaining the "Canine Characteristics" ability and increasing their EP and OP by 40%. Another effect on their body is the slight growth, strengthening, and shaping if their teeth into Fangs , and their nails into (2)Claws , as well as increasing their Land Speed by 40% when running on all fours! However, the most dangerous aspect of this Dōjutsu is it's ability to manipulating others with their own will by a simple shared glance via the eye's technique, " Commanding Stare " which forces the commanded to obey short and simple instructions, such as "sit", "stay", "fetch", and other movements or half actions/reactions, against their will, exception of self harm as long as they are within the effective range and can hear the commands. As intriguing as these eyes seem, not all are worthy of being blessed by their possession, awakening this gift only once the Ōkami has recognized a true pack of at least 5 who are loyal deep down, and have been truly recognized in kind as their leader, also unlocking the "Ōkamiogan" skill. As long as this Dōjutsu is actived, it costs -5ChP per Minute per eye. Kuraōkamiogan IMG=1NM The second, final, and greatest stage of this Dōjutsu, the Kuraōkamiogan... These eyes are forbidden for any to posesses but one, they who are said to be divinely chosen, recognized by their clan's people as their one truest leader, awakened with an "Ōkamiogan" Score of 100 and 10 followers. Upon activation, the castor's hair bleaches to hues of grey or even white as an ancient dwelling power surfaces, their claws blacken and grow, (Fangs ), their teeth sharpen, ((2)Claws ). Their ascended senses in all ways grant them the "Sensory Type" trait and cause EP and OP increase by 80%, as does their land speed when running on all fours! These eyes may still cast "Commanding Stare", but now at a 50% greater effect, but more terrifying still is their " Dominating Gaze ", which binds the target's will to their own, preventing them from intentionally or knowingly disobeying or opposing the will of their master and their demands, barring harm to themself or the latter. Keeping this stage active drains -7ChP of the castor per eye per minute.

name: Commanding Stare
prerequisite: Must possess the Ōkamiogan or the Kuraōkamiogan
description: By catching the target in direct eye contact, vs the castor's ROP, one may bind said target through a proverbial leash to their targets Will, held firmly by their own, as long and far as the master may sense the presence of the bound. The commanded is forced to obey simple 3 word instructions, manipulating half of their movements, actions, or reactions, against their will, with the exception of self harm or allowance of harm to self, as long as they are within the effective range and can hear the commands, costing -12ChP to cast and per command, The connection severs once the target or castor are out of range, (the castor can no longer clearly sense the target), or reach 0HP, the castor ends it, or if the link is some how broken by other means.

name: Dominating Gaze
prerequisite: Must possess the Kuraōkamiogan , Must know "Gyōshi o Shiki Suru"
description: As with it's precursor, a metaphysical link is established via direct eye contact, one must evade the castor's ROP to evade their gaze... Failing to do so will fasten a spiritual collar to the subjects soul, made from a piece of their own core's chakra. Unlike it's lesser varient, the boundries of this technique are not restricted to the castor's senses, but may instead reach out to Miles equal to their Will, however they must still be directed clearly within the limits of their masters senses and be able to hear their orders. The instructions given may be more complex than prior, reaching up to 5 words in length, costing 24ChP per commandment, causing the subservient to follow their master's will to the best of their capabilities, willingly or otherwise, outside of self harm or allowed harm to self. Their own Will, even if not instructed, will prevent them from intentionally bringing harm to their master or sabatoging their orders, thusly creating a sort of forced loyalty. As before, this contract is broken once the master ends it, they or the servent reach 0HP, the link is somehow severed by other means, or either party get out of range if the other.

name: Tree Climbing Technique
prerequisite: Must at least have a Chakra Control Score of 25.
cost: 2 Chakra Points per round adhered to a surface.
description: The Tree Climbing Technique involves focusing a fixed amount of chakra to the bottom of one's feet, and using that to climb a tree without using one's hands. If the stream of chakra is too weak, the user will lose their footing on the tree and fall off. If it is too strong, the user will be pushed away from the tree, causing the tree to break around the point of contact and the user will fall. This does not apply only to trees, but any surface vertical, horizontal, or even upside down!

name: Water Walking Technique
prerequisite: Must at least have a Chakra Control Score of 50.
cost: 3 Chakra Points per round on Water Surface.
description: To do this, the user has to be emitting a constant stream of chakra from the bottom of the their feet and using the repellent force to walk across the water's surface. This technique is more difficult to master than the�Tree Climbing Technique, because the amount of chakra that needs to be emitted changes constantly. It doesn't have to just be at the feet. A user under water can focus chakra on their hands or any other body part that makes contact with the surface of the water. If they were submerged, they can climb atop the water as if they were climbing out of a pool.

name: Body Flicker Technique
description: The�Body Flicker Technique�is a high-speed movement technique. By using the Body Flicker Technique, a ninja can move short to long distances at an almost untraceable speed. To an observer, it appears as if the user has teleported. It is accomplished by using chakra to temporarily vitalise the body and move at extreme speeds. The amount of chakra required depends on the overall distance between the user and the intended destination. A puff of smoke is occasionally used to disguise the user's movements. Other nearby elements or substances can be used instead to distract the opponent such as leaves, sand, water, etc. As such, this ability grants the user an extra +5 temporary EP or OP/ROP, and in the right situation, grant the user half stealth.

If used to surround a target, they must evade the users ROP... By incremently increasing the output by -3ChP, you raise the dimensions and ROP by +1 each, the DP/Str by +5, and time by 12 seconds!

This miniature tornado has a width and height of 1m������������������������������������������������m�������������������������x2m, with a DP of 10, the strength of it's air current being equivalent to it's DP, and lasts for 30 seconds (10 rounds). If used to surround a target, they must evade the users ROP... By incremently increasing the output by -3ChP, you raise the dimensions and ROP by +1 each, the DP/Str by +5, and time by 12 seconds!

name: Wind Style: Moon Step
description: The�Geppo�allows the users to actually jump, (not step), off the air itself, allowing them to stay in the air for much longer than usual and move more freely within a three dimensional space. These jumps may actually be treated as having had "running starts" to determine their height/distance, +6(Inches/Feet). Users may even use this technique to cross great distances without ever touching the ground, set themselves up for swift, aerial attacks, or use it to cushion their fall damage by half! While the technique itself affords several advantages both in and out of battle for the user, it has but one major weakness: since its usage depends heavily on the user's legs, restraining or pinning down any major parts of their lower body can significantly disrupt�Geppo.

name: Earth Release: Tunneling Technique
description: This is a technique that allows the user to create tunnels in and through the earth in order to travel underground by displacing the earth, as well as closing openings. The utility in this technique holds a suprisingly wide variety of verstility in the hands of the creative. By molding ones chakra and the earth, castors expend 5 chakra points to tunnel out 1��������x1 meters of earth, typically 1 meter in diameter, 1 meter deep, per use. An additional 3 ChP may be spent every 1 cubic meter moved for a maximum of 10m per round. If this technique were to be reversed in order to fill 1 cubic meter, these manipulated earth would have a DP of 10, as well as a grapple score of 10, pinning any within the filled space who cannot react to the castor's R.O.P. +(3 Per Cubic Meter).

name: Water Style: Water Whip
description: The user creates a�whip�made of water that, as a regular whip could, strike at or even wrap around the opponent, adding the user's Will to the weapons DP instead of the users Strength for it's grappling score. In it's base state, the Water Whip has the following stats: Water Whip , however, the length, damage, and DP increase by +1 for every 3ChP and 24oz added to it upon creation. Being a whip like weapon, this uses ROP+Length instead of OP. The water remains stable once formed, however, is destroyed if broken, removed from the user's grasp, if the user runs out of chakra, or if the user loses consciousness.

name: Water Style: Hiding in the Mist Technique
prerequisite: Nearby Water Source, Air Moisture, or Mist
description: Users use the surrounding moisture to fill the air with mist and condense it's thickness with their�chakra. Once the mists are thick enough that opponents cannot see, that in turn means they cannot manage much defense against the user. The Jutsu is centered on the user upon creation, spreading out to a Diameter of 5 Meters and a hieght of 3 meters. The size is increased by 2m�x1m for every extra 3ChP spent per round the mist is formed. Along with the user instantly gaining the "Half-stealth" effect upon use. Everyone inside this mist, including the user, is treated as if "Blinded", as well as anyone outside looking, or attacking, into the Mist. Hieghtened sensiry capabilities or Doujutsu reduce this effect to "Half Blind".
