name: Hazy Genjutsu
description: This technique casts an illusion on the enemy that blurs the target's vision of the entire area. In addition, it causes the victim to react as though they're sinking in quicksand, effectively immobilising the target. The resulting effect reduces the target's EP, DP, OP, ROP, effective vision, and Movement Speed by 10% as long as they are under the effects of this genjutsu. To place a target under this effect, the castor must face their enemy with the open palm of their hand from as far as 10 meters away, using ones ROP to hit, and the user must stay in this range of their target or the Genjutsu will break. Every +5ChP extra pumped into this jutsu increases its range by 5 meters and its effect by +5%.

name: Sexy Jutsu
description: Much like its parent Jutsu, the Transformation Technique, this allows the user to cloak their true firm via taking the appearance and properties of another. However, unlike the generic version however, this variation is far more specific, focused, detailed... For this, one must have a deep understanding of the human form, anatomy, and mind, for they must take what they believe to be a form attractive enough to stun their target, a scantly clad or even nude visage, most often of the opposite sex, unable to rely on the cover of familiar cloth, they must perfectly replicate the skin, flesh, voice, and most alluring attributes of their targets desire! This is best used when the targets guard is down, but it's hard for any to mentally prepare for such a tact, requiring the castors ROP to avoid the gaze of or simply resist with sheer mental fortitude or be Stunned for that round or until struck! One caught completely by surprise will suffer +2 Bleed and be launched up and back 10 feet, falling prone. As long as you remain in this form, you gain a +5 Temp OP and EP that restores to 5 at the start if each turn transformed. This costs -3ChP for every consecutive minute transformed and can be dismissed at will, or forcibly being directly stuck, running out of Chakra, or falling unconcious. This will not have any effect non-intellilectual life forms or beings in uncontrollably, bloodlusted states.

name: Spiraling Sphere
prerequisite: One must have 200 Chakra Control and 200 Experience
description: The�Rasengan�is a spinning ball of pure�chakra is�formed and held in the palm of the user's hand.The Rasengan was created based on observations made of the� Tailed Beast Bomb , intended to be the highest form of�shape transformation. The Rasengan does not require�hand seals�to perform. Once it is formed, it also does not require any additional chakra to sustain it, which means that there is no definite limit to how long the Rasengan can be maintained, however, more chakra may be pumped into it to increase it's size and power. However, the Rasengan will dissipate if it collides with something, even if it's an unintended target. On contact, the Rasengan grinds into its target, propels them along the Rasengan's trajectory - either away from the user or into the ground beneath them - and at some point bursts, causing severe damage at the point of contact. Though not as masterful as it's shape transformation, givin it's elementless nature, one may add properties of an elemenral nature into this technique via Chakra Flow . Hitting someone with this deals melee damage once it hits them and the raw energy causes 1��Burn, from there, the Rasengan launches the target 10 feet in the direction of its trajectory before erupting and dealing 40 Damage! Every additional 13ChP put in, incrementally increases the size of the Rasengan, (6", 12", 18", etc), and increases the distance by 5 feet, the damage by +20, and +1 burn.

name: One Thousand Birds
prerequisite: One must have 200 Chakra Control and 200 Experience
description: To perform, the user first gathers lightning to their hand; the high concentration of electricity produces a sound reminiscent of many birds chirping, hence the name.�Once the chakra is gathered, users charge at their target and thrust the Chidori into them, piercing them and typically causing fatal damage. Despite the sound it makes, the rapid speed at which it's used makes it useful for assassinations. If one is hit by this, the target takes melee damage as well as +35 Lightning Damage that also shocks them and makes them Bleed. Unlike many other jutsu, this jutsu can not be improved by adding more chakra into it. The speed at which the Chidori is performed, despite being one of its greatest assets, also represents one of its biggest drawbacks. On one hand, ½ of the distance traveled between point A to point B is added to this attack's OP and Damage. However, users move at their target so fast that its causes a�tunnel vision-like effect for them. Because they charge in a straight line it is easy for opponents to attack them, and because of the tunnel vision it is difficult for the user to see these attacks, much less react to them, unable to Evade or Defend from counter attacks. For this reason, most ninja cannot use the Chidori safely.

name: Earth Release: golem technique
description: This technique allows the user to create a large, humanoid creature composed of rock and stone in order to protect and aid it's user as an extension of their body! This golem is completely controlled by the caster, sharing their EP, but has it's base damage and Speed of 10, with DP of 30, standing 2 meters (6ft) tall! This golem is to be controlled via physical contact with the user, if the user ever stops touching it the golem will becone inert and collapse. With every extra 15Chp and 30ib of earth poured into this golem increases its damage and Speed by +10, and it's DP by 30, as well as increases it's size by +2m(6').

name: String Bean Binding Illusion
prerequisite: Must know Tree Binding Death, Invisibility, 100 Genjutsu score
description: A typical technique amongst the members of the�Kurama clan. The illusion shows the user disappear before the opponent is surrounded by several bean vines that bind their body and lift them into the air. A bean pod then rises from the ground which opens to reveal the user, ready to strike. As this technique is cast upon a target within ROP range Several bean vines then wrap around the target rendering them grappled for an amount of rounds equal to the castor's Will + Genjutsu vs the target's will. A unique aspect of this technique in comparison to it's parent jutsu is the aspect that two targets can be effected by this jutsu, however the castor must instead grapple their will + Genjutsu vs the two target's will + will ÷ 2 With every 15chp the jutsu allows for one more person to be added into the fray, allowing for a total of 11 targets at tier ten. However as a result with each added person their wills must be added together and divided by the amount affected.

name: Palm Seal
prerequisite: 30 Fuinjutsu, 200 Chakra Control, Finger Carving Seal
description: In essense, this is an advanced version of the Finger Carving Seal, however, instead of meticulously carving seals, your chakra control is so fine, your caligraphy so fine and practiced, that you can mentally shape the characters with your own chakra through you open palm, able to swiftly imprint the formula of your technique by burning your chakra into the point of contact! Seals made in this way will remain even after the castor dies, even if visable markings are removed, as long as the chakra remains or the target area remains intact. This technique may only imprint up to 20oz, (25 ChP), worth of marking per use.

name: Paralysis Tag
description: Paralysis Tags�(�� , �Mahi Fuda), also called Petrify Paper, are scraps of paper inscribed with a special Fuinjutsu text. Infused with chakra, they will completely stun whomever attached to after a set amount of time, or remotely remotely. The tags can be attached to a surface or wrapped around a weapon to be thrown at an enemy. They are very versatile and one of the basic ninja tools. They work even under heavy rain. When an paralysis tag is triggered remotely, ninja need to use a hand seal, requiring two hands. The paralysis has a grapple score of 30 to resist with one's raw Strength, or lasts for 1 minute (60 seconds/10 rounds), or until removed/destroyed. The effect, and chakra cost, is increased by adding more tags, but each tag after the first is only half as effective, adding +1 Stun, but half as strong, and costs half as much chakra. One who knows this technique may also spend 4oz of ink to disable another's petrifying paper and use it as their own.

By placing 3 or more tags 1 meter from eachother, in a shape, not a line, this becomes an erea of effect, reaching up to a 10m diameter with 10 tags as their sealing energies connect, sealing up to 100% of the target's Chakra. This tag seals the targets connection to their chakra network with grapple score of 30 to resist with one's power of Will, or lasts for 1 minute (60 seconds/10 rounds), or until removed/destroyed. name: Sage Art: Step Method
prerequisite: Chakra Control 200, Sage Mode, Tree Climbing Jutsu, Water Walking Jutsu
cost: 13 Sage Chakra Points per Minute active.
description: Hoh4�or Agility (歩法, hoh4; lit. step method) is an ancient technique said to have been developed by a sage long ago amidst fighting a god of death while observing how the Shinigami seemed to be walking on solid air, or so the legend goes... Eventually, the safe had realized it wasn't air, but rather, they had been collecting some sort of energy beneath their feet to stand on, energy that would be invisible to the naked, mortal eye... The sage would use similar methods they knew to walk up trees and walls, or across bodies of water, to collect, mold, and shape the Natural Chakra that existed all around them to form similar, solid, platforms to travel across. Some say they used this technique to escape the Pure Lands, others say they used the Shinigami's own technique to defeat them, and earn there freedom from the afterlife... By using this technique, the user is freely able to walk, run, jump, and travel in a three dimensional space in any direction as they please as if ground existed where it does not. Even if the user were to fall from 100 meters, they may instead fall and "land" a mere two meters down by forming these invisible 1�x1m square platforms from seemingly no where beneath their hands or feet. The only ones able to see or sense these platforms are those who are also able to harness Nature or Sage Chakra, or, those who possess the Rennigan. If struck directly by any decent amount of force, these platforms completely shatter, providing no pritection or cover of any sort besides harmless debris, deflections or pressures.

name: Mirror Wheel Eye
prerequisite: Must be an Uchiha , or Transplant a Sharingan.
cost: Dependent on Stage, Doubled for non-Uchiha
description: The Sharingan, Literally meaning: Mirror Wheel Eye, is the dōjutsu kekkei genkai of the Uchiha clan that appears selectively among its members. When a wielder of this kekkei genkai experiences a powerful emotional condition with regards to a person precious to them, their brain releases a special form of chakra that affects the optic nerves, transforming the eyes into Sharingan; for that reason the Sharingan is described as an "eye that reflects the heart". Often, as per the Uchiha's so-called "Curse of Hatred", this emotion is a negative one, brought on by stress or loss The emotion may also be positive, driven by a desire to protect or reunite with a loved one, but the emotion must be traumatically strong. One of the Sharingan is known as the "Eye of Insight", where as the other is refered to as the "Eye of Hypnotism", however, this may be a misnomer as the abilities of either may be used interchangeably, excluding their final stage which would be the only way to truly tell the difference. That said, having only a single sharingan halves it's ocular abilities. Unlike other dōjutsu, the Sharingan evolves into stages of increasing power and effect, each phase requiring a special trigger, and potential. Even though this Dojūtsu is considered a C-Rank KKG, each stage is progressively stronger, and more straining, requiring the mind and body of the weilder to be strong enough to evolve, needing the prerequisites of higher ranks potential to unlock. These eyes also birth unique techniques, not requiring the purchase there of, however, to understand how to use said techniques, there must be the necessary room in the Jutsu Bank and the proper potential. Single Tomoe: D-Rank The 1st Tomoe of the sharingan awakens when the user has suffered the feeling of true betrayal, heartbreak, desperation, or denial. This stage drains -2ChP/Minute activated per eye activated. The "Eye of Insight" allows the user to analyze even the slightest of movements, including reading lips. This even allows the user to closely observe Taijutsu, Bukijutsu, and Kenjutsu, (that aren't clan locked), and replicate them, if physically able, after witnessing it performed 5 times, adding the new technique to their Jutsu Pool. This also passively increases the user's EP, OP, and ROP by +10%. Through the "Eye of Hypnotism", when casting Genjutsu via Sharingan with a Single Tomoe, or having genjutsu cast visually to the host through their sharingan, one uses their Sharingan score as the "Grappling Strength" +10% of there Genjutsu score. They also use their "Sharingan" and "Genjutsu" score to determine the increase in Genjutsu effects cast in this way. Upon gaining the first Tomoe, one is able to perform a special technique, known only as " Genjutsu: Sharingan ", via direct eye contact, requiring a C-Rank Jutsu Bank slot to possess, understand and use. At this stage, if the target has a 50% lower Genjutsu grappling score, you can implant suggestions in your targets mind to think or move in minor ways, effecting half their actions or reactions, making 5 word statemens or believing 5 word thoughts, increasing by +5 words per sharingan stage, while leaving them to think the thoughts were there own. Casting Genjutsu: Sharingan also lowers the target's EP, OP, and ROP by 10%, increasing by 10% per Sharingan stage! Double Tomoe: C-Rank The 2nd Tomoe of the sharingan awakens when the user or someone very close or dear to them is, or is truly believed to be, the target of an attack that will kill them, a deep feeling of helplessness or despair, and the 1st tomoe has already been unlocked. This stage drains -4ChP/Minute activated per eye activated. The "Eye of Insight" can now visably see external chakra, giving it color in order to distinguish it by its composition and source aswell, even track chakra trails left behind as old as an hour. Overall, the user may now replicate all kinds of techniques, (that are not clan locked), if capable, after witnessing them performed 4 times, adding the new techniques to their Jutsu Pool, and passively increases the user's EP, OP, and ROP by +20%. Through the "Eye of Hypnotism", when casting Genjutsu via Sharingan with a Double Tomoe, or having genjutsu cast visually to the host through their sharingan, one uses their Sharingan score as the "Grappling Strength" +20% of there Genjutsu score. if the target has a 50% lower Genjutsu grappling score, your genjutsu can read concious thoughts and extract truthful statements of 10 words or less, increasing by 5 words per tier. Triple Tomoe: B-Rank The 3rd Tomoe of the sharingan awakens only after the 1st and second have. The user must witness the death of someone dear to them, or to somehow be resuscitated from death, the feeling of truly deep loss, or of being so relatively close to death itself. This stage drains -6ChP/Minute activated per eye activated. Their "Eye of Insight" may now visably see internal chakra even through thin obstacles, although not aswell as the Byakugan, it may track chakra trails left behind as old as a day. They now can replicate techniques, if able, after witnessing them performed 3 times and passively increases the user's EP, OP, and ROP by +30%. Through the "Eye of Hypnotism", when casting Genjutsu via Sharingan with a Triple Tomoe, or having genjutsu cast visually to the host through their sharingan, one uses their Sharingan score as the "Grappling Strength" +30% of there Genjutsu score. Their genjutsu can see day old memories as far back as 1 month, increasing by +1 month per stage, and enter the mind scape of their target's subconcious of targets if the target has a 50% lower Genjutsu grappling score. Mangekyō: A-Rank A Mangekyō Sharingan is distinguished from a normal Sharingan by its appearance, which changes the form of the tomoe seal. While the exact design differs for each user, though all resemble pinwheels. This may only be awakened once the three tomoe have been granted, and the user must be, or truly feel, the trauma of being responsible for a truly loved one or closest friend or family. Just being activated drains -8ChP/Minute per eye activated, but each eye also gains S-Rank abilities unique to the user with their own costs, and when used together, form the great, "Susanoo". Over time and repeated use, the dōjutsu cast by the Mangekyō's eyes may lead to their eye's permanent loss of vision. The castor may use their Mangekyō dōjutsu an amount of times equivalent to 10+(10% (1/10th) of their "Sharingan" score), (rounded down). Using the Susanoo adds 1 use for each eye. In practice, this means the eye of one with a "Sharingan" score of 100 will become "Blind" on it's 10th use of it's power. Eternal Mangekyō: S-Rank, Kinjutsu The Mangekyō Sharingan may only be obtained by removing your own Mangekyō Sharingan, and replace them, transplanting the Mangekyō of a close blood relative, making it absolutely secret and forbidden in order to avoide intentional familicide. Unlike with other transplants, this second evolution will allow the user to retain their original techniques in addition to access the new eyes' respective techniques, but will never lose their sight for this. These eyes reflect both, merging the designs of the two Uchiha's Mangekyō Sharingan together when activated and drain -10ChP/Minute per eye activated, as well as gain the ability to aquire the Perfect Susanoo. This stage also increases the effects of the lower tiers.
prerequisite_raw: Must be an Uchiha , or Transplant a Sharingan.
cost_raw: Dependent on Stage, Doubled for non-Uchiha
description_raw: The Sharingan, Literally meaning: Mirror Wheel Eye, is the dōjutsu kekkei genkai of the Uchiha clan that appears selectively among its members. When a wielder of this kekkei genkai experiences a powerful emotional condition with regards to a person precious to them, their brain releases a special form of chakra that affects the optic nerves, transforming the eyes into Sharingan; for that reason the Sharingan is described as an "eye that reflects the heart". Often, as per the Uchiha's so-called "Curse of Hatred", this emotion is a negative one, brought on by stress or loss The emotion may also be positive, driven by a desire to protect or reunite with a loved one, but the emotion must be traumatically strong. One of the Sharingan is known as the "Eye of Insight", where as the other is refered to as the "Eye of Hypnotism", however, this may be a misnomer as the abilities of either may be used interchangeably, excluding their final stage which would be the only way to truly tell the difference. That said, having only a single sharingan halves it's ocular abilities. Unlike other dōjutsu, the Sharingan evolves into stages of increasing power and effect, each phase requiring a special trigger, and potential. Even though this Dojūtsu is considered a C-Rank KKG, each stage is progressively stronger, and more straining, requiring the mind and body of the weilder to be strong enough to evolve, needing the prerequisites of higher ranks potential to unlock. These eyes also birth unique techniques, not requiring the purchase there of, however, to understand how to use said techniques, there must be the necessary room in the Jutsu Bank and the proper potential. name: Illusion Technique: Mirror Wheel Eye
description: By establishing eye contact with a target with ROP, or even using OP to make eye contacted at Melee range, the Sharingan user traps them within a genjutsu which can be exploited for one of various purposes, such as: causing instantaneous — but temporary — loss of consciousness or paralysis in the target, forceful extraction of information, relaying memories, removing genjutsu placed on the target by others, and even controlling a target's actions to an extent. The extent of these capabilities are relient on the stage of the sharingan used.
description_raw: By establishing eye contact with a target with ROP, or even using OP to make eye contacted at Melee range, the Sharingan user traps them within a genjutsu which can be exploited for one of various purposes, such as: causing instantaneous — but temporary — loss of consciousness or paralysis in the target, forceful extraction of information, relaying memories, removing genjutsu placed on the target by others, and even controlling a target's actions to an extent. The extent of these capabilities are relient on the stage of the sharingan used.

name: Susanoo
prerequisite: Must be an Uchiha who has unlocked the Mangekyō Sharingan in both eyes.
description: Susanoo is a gigantic, humanoid avatar made of the user's chakra which surrounds them and fights on their behalf. When activated, Susanoo forms around the user and becomes an extension of their will, acting and attacking on their behalf. By default, Susanoo is anchored to its user and they to it: in its less developed forms it will move around with the user; in its more completed forms the user will be suspended within Susanoo, being brought with it as it moves around. Susanoo has several developmental stages. Each stage has it's own rank representing it's complexity to ise, filling Jutsu Bank Slots. Practiced users go through all the stages every time they manifest it, layering more advanced stages over earlier ones or stripping them away as is needed; they can choose to stop at any developmental stage. Once unlocked, add "Susanoo" to your list of Jutsu Skills. First Stage: C-Rank At its simplest level, users only manifest aspects of Susanoo's skeletal structure, such as a ribcage for basic defence or an arm for interacting with the surroundings. This basic structure has a DP of 100 and it's own strength score of 25, using it's castor's OP as it's own. Forming this takes 10ChP and every minute after to sustain. Second Stage B-Rank Above having a simple rib cage, the 3 meter (9') tall skeletal structure of an upper torso is formed, adding a neck, skull, and second arm. To evolve to this stage, the castor must have a "Susanoo" score of 25. The Susanoo now has a Strength score of 50, and it's DP in this stage has increased to 200. Forming this takes 15ChP and every following minute to sustain. Third Stage B-Rank Susanoo now has "sinew" and "flesh", this torso, sitting 5m (15') high... To evolve to this point, the castor must have a "Susanoo" score of 50. These extra layers have raised it's DP to 300, and these muscles have raised it's strength 75. Forming this takes 20ChP and every minute to sustain. Fourth Stage A-Rank The now 10m (30') Susanoo is coated in a unique set of armor, it's DP now 400 with a stength score of 100. By this stage, it has also gained a spiritual weapon or unique to it's castor equivalent to a first tier S-Rank Technique. This ability To evolve to this point, the castor's "Susanoo" score must reach 60. Forming this takes 25ChP every continuous minute to sustain. Full Susanoo S-Rank Now in it's fifth, and quite legendary stage, this Susanoo literally stands 20m (60') tall, walking on two legs as its castor is suspended above the ground within it's core! Their unique spiritual weapon is now the equivalent of a fifth tier S-Rank Technique. To evolve to this form, one's "Susanoo" score must be 100. This form has 500 DP, 150 Strength, and can move at twice the land speed of it's castor. Forming this takes 30ChP and every minute to sustain. Perfect Susanoo S-Rank, Kinjutsu The absolute, true, full form of the Susanoo that's on par with even the likes of the Tailed Beasts... This heavenly state can only be evolved with the power of the Eternal Mangekyō Sharingan and the Full Susanoo! This diety like state stands at 50m (150') tall, it's castor suspended by a protective crystal in its forehead. It's DP is worth 1000, and it's strength is equivalent to 300. Their unique spiritual weapon is now the equivalent of a tenth tier S-Rank Technique. It can move on land and air at three times the speed of it's castor with it's giant legs and wings that protrude from it's back. Forming and sustaining this costs 30ChP every minute active.

name: Demonic Illusion: Rotation of Heaven and Earth
description: When a genjutsu is used on them, the user quickly decrypts the genjutsu with their Sharingan to understand how it works, allowing them to reverse the active Genjutsu onto their attacker, causing a "Genjutsu Reversal", if the user is able to break a Genjutsu cast onto them, similar to reversing the dominant and submissive roles of a grapple. The cost of this jutsu is almost entirely dependent on the Genjutsu cast, costing +1Tier higher than the Genjutsu being reversed. Unlike other many other jutsu, the effect of this technique cannot be increased UNLESS the user also personally knows how to perform the jutsu cast on them they are reversing.

description: The opponent is caught in the illusionary world created by the user, and the victim is tormented with the sensation of having spikes driven through them, taking away their body's freedom. At the same time, the physical pain accompanying the illusion reveals that the greatest use this technique has is torture. Using ROP to make eye contacted if needed, the Sharingan user traps them within a genjutsu which causes +1 temporary disabled status and -6DP. For each additional 6 points of chakra fed into the jutsu, the damage to DP will increase by 6 aswell as stack +1 temporary disability.

name: Authority of the Gods
prerequisite: Must naturally unlock the "Mangekyo Sharingan" and have a fitting predisposition, or implant eye from previous owner of this Mangeky...
prerequisite_raw: Must naturally unlock the "Mangekyo Sharingan" and have a fitting predisposition, or implant eye from previous owner of this Mangeky...

name: Speak Technique
prerequisite: Must have a tragic yet relatable backstory.
cost: The castor and target must both be at 50% HP or less, and the castor must find a contradiction in the target's ideology, logic, or reasoning that they intend to challenge.
description: This technique, when used with efficient skill, is used to talk adversaries down from their objectives,beliefs, and or ideologies. In order to expertly deploy the Talk no Jutsu, one must engage their empathy as well as their knowledge of their enemy. Without a deep understanding of the opponent’s ideology, as well as their history, one cannot find the flaws in their thinking, nor how to relate to them on a personal basis. By pinpointing a critical contradiction in their opponents position, may form a connection between their targets and their own through personal similarities and or shared experiences/trauma. Once this bond is formed, they must compete in a battle of wills. This struggle is fought by wearing down eachother's "Will" Traits, which add together to form a single measure of "Will Power". To chip this trait down, begining with the castor, a party must systematically tear apart their target's position once per turn, reducing their target's Will by an ammount equal to half their Intelligence Trait for each correct statement that is not correctly countered. If the accusation or challenge is successfully rebuted in the first rebuke, you do not lose any room of "Will Power". As one challenger's Will reduces, the other's increases. This however goes both ways, meaning the castor runs the risk of their own stance waivering. If the party's "Will" hits 0, they MUST forfiet. The Will of those involved return to normal by ±10%/Round.

name: Lightning Cutter
prerequisite: One must have 300 Chakra Control and 300 Experience, Chidori
description: Like the Chidori, the Lightning Cutter requires a large amount of chakra to be performed, because they are performed in fundamentally the same way: both concentrate lightning chakra in the hand; both are used to rapidly pierce targets; both pose danger to the user without advanced visual or chakra sensing ability. However, the Raikiri, unlike the Chidori, does not rely on speed, instead proving to be far more versitile and able to produce far more raw power than the Chidori aswell as being able to remain stability held together for a prolonged period of time and used even from an idle position. If one is hit by this, the target takes melee damage as well as +45 Lightning Damage that also shocks them and makes them Bleed, similar to the Chidori, but may actually be amplified by +20 Damage, +1Bleed, +1 shock for every extra 13 ChP put into it. Being more stable than the Chidori, this jutsu can hold it's shape as long as needed, however, unless you are able to properly monitor it's chakra flow through specialized dojutsu or enhanced sensing capabilities, it will harm it's user, causing 10 Damage per round to the castor aswell as +1 burn per tier...

name: Flying Raijin Jutsu
cost: 25oz Ink, 25 Chakra Points per 25 Meters Traveled
description: Before the Flying Thunder God Technique can be performed, users must first mark a target with their "technique formula" (術式, jutsu-shiki). There is no limit to how many targets can be marked with technique formulas. This marking may be applied to tags, inanimate surfaces, or even living beings! Once formed, the user must imprint 5 points of their own chakra into the seal for this technique to work in order for it to gain a matching chakra signature to it's programmer. Creating the mark with the Finger Carving Seal or the Palm Seal can bypass this requirement. This chakra will never fade away, even after the user's death, as long the ink and the marked surface remain intact. Once the seal is complete, the user can form the seal of comradery with their fingers and INSTANTLY warp to any of their markings, within 1 meter, as long as they are within their chakra sensing range. When used to evade or attack, the user temporarily gains 25% of their max EP, or OP respectively, to their OP/EP of that action/counter!

name: Healing Palms Technique
prerequisite: Have at least 150 Iryojutsu, know "Painkiller Jutsu", "Burn Mending Jutsu", Blood Coagulation Jutsu", snd "Bone Repair Jutsu".
description: This is a very advanced healing technique where the user applies their hand to the afflicted or wounded part of the body and sends chakra into it, accelerating the body's natural healing abilities, which also conserves ones own Chakra. Although its most obvious use is as a way of treating external wounds, it can also be used for internal injury or illness as well. This jutsu is able to repair 1 disabled limb, 1% of Bleeding, 1% of Poison, 1% of burn damage, and heal 30 of the patient's total HP. You may also heal more sooner, healing 1 additional Tier of all status effects and healing 20HP for each aditional 15ChP used.

name: Chakra Enhanced Strength
prerequisite: 500 chakra control, 100 Taijutsu, 100 Iryojutsu, must know Chakra Flow
description: A special type of Taijutsu that uses the refined chakra control and concentration required in medical ninjutsu to enhance one's strength to monstrous levels. This is done by storing chakra into one's hands or feet, and releasing it onto the target with pinpoint timing. When activated the castor enhances their strength score by an amount equal to the percentage paid x 4. If one paid 10% of their chakra they would enhance their strength by 40%, so on so forth. This cost is paid once every round and can even be used to enhance the jump distance of the castor by enhancing the strength in one's legs.

name: Sage Mode
prerequisite: Form a contract with a Shōkan species
description: Sage Mode is an empowered state that can be entered by blending natural energy with one's chakra, creating senjutsu chakra. Sage Mode allows users to tap into the natural force of the world, opening up new techniques to them and allowing them to power up existing ones with the new senjutsu chakra. Senjutsu is a specialised field of techniques that allows the user to sense and then gather natural energy, or Nature Chakra, a far more potent form of chakra than is found inside of individual Shinobi, so one with this sage chakra, may pay 1SChP in place of 2ChP, aswell as push normal jutsu past its normal 10 tier limit, up to 20! Senjutsu practitioners learn to draw the energy of nature inside of them, blending it with their own chakra.This adds a new dimension of power to the practitioner's chakra, resulting in the creation of "Sage chakra" which may be accessed through a state called "Sage Mode" which gives a significant boost to most stats and offer unique, special traits, depending on contracted beings called Shōkan. But all of this must be learned through gaining the trust of a summoning contract they were allowed to sign by another Sage or Shōkan, and trained in the homelands of said summon, or one must discover such a place themself. In order for one to actually access Sage Mode and therefore sage chakra, one must have a Senjutsu Score, however, any score beow 100 will result in an imperfect sage mode, and will forever lock the strength of one's sage mode. In other words, if one have a Senjutsu Score of 50 and enter sage mode, they will never be able to enter a sage mode past 50%, and attempting to enter sage mode with a score any lower than 50 will result in the shinobi mutating into a creature more animal than human, before dying as their body petrifies irreversibley into a stone statue... In order to enter sage mode, one must remain perfectly still and unmoved, merging Natural Energy with their own chakra to form Sage Chakra. For every round the user meditates, they lose Max ChP=Senjutsu Score, gaining a new Sage Chakra Pool (SChP) = ½ChP transformed. One may only transmutate a percent of their Chakra Pool equal to their Stage of Sage Mode in order to enter the state, otherwise they will lose the gathered chakra. For example, one with Sage mode (50%) could augment up to 50% of their Chakra into Sage Chakra. Each sage mode grants unique abilities and features that match the species of their contracted Shōkan, however, all share an amplification to the users base stats, amplifying all five base stats by a percentage equal to the level of ones Sage Mode. Perfect Sages show only tinted pigmentations around their eyes, where the further from the perfect union of one's chakra and nature energy results in more facial markings, to more tattooing over the body, and less and less human, showing more and more animalistic qualities. The animalistic traits of lesser sage modes with more feral mutations are actually superior to those granted to sage mode, such as as increased Jumping, Digging, Climbing, or Swimming abilities, etc, etc, etc with possible tails, claws, horns, wings, gills, etc. However, greater sage modes offer higher stat increases and longer lasting sage modes. *For exampke, a 50% sage would burn 5 Sage Chakra Points per Round, but a 100% Sage would burn 10SChP/Round. *While in Sage Mode, the user is treated as a "Sensory Type", now able to sense the chakra signatures around them by concentrating as well as able to supress their own. This extends in a diameter equal to the users ROP+Willl. This is doubled for Shinobi that were already Sensory Types prior to this state of being.
